channel.title: When i start up my server and click somewhere the client turns off
channel.description: hey can some1 help me ive got a problem when i start my server everything is ok but then when im actully on my server if i type it works but when i click anywhere the client just turns off this is the same for most of the clients ive used. Can some1 plz help me ive read a guide but for some reason my comp dousnt let me see the link for a download of some programme can some1 plz help me.

item.title: When i start up my server and click somewhere the client turns off

item.description:

oh soz i think i have fixed this now though thanks

item.title: When i start up my server and click somewhere the client turns off
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

Look in the folder you are running your client from, Do you have any HSERROR logs in the same folder?
